name: Super Cars (Amiga/C64/CPC/Spectrum)
description:
Originally released in 1990, this top-down combat racer from the creators of the Lotus Esprit Turbo Challenge games saw players take the wheel of a high-powered super car in an all-out deadly race. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version.

Contains the Commodore Amiga, Commodore 64, Amstrad CPC, and ZX Spectrum versions of the game.

Gameplay

Compete in a series of dangerous races. Use your prize money to upgrade your car, adding everything from a turbocharger to missiles!


This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including:

  • Saving/loading the game at any point
  • Support for most modern game controllers
  • Full control remapping
  • Image scaling and smoothing options
